document.full_text: the indiana pacers shocked the new york knicks with a convincing 106-93 victory on sunday, ending a six-game losing streak despite playing without leading scorer danny granger.
document.title: pacers stun knicks and snap six-game skid
lines_and_colors: the indiana pacers shocked the new york knicks with a convincing 106-93 victory on sunday, ending a six-game losing streak despite playing without leading scorer danny granger.
